sentences.english: Appreciation of sculpture depends upon the ability to respond to form in three dimension.
sentences.chinese: 對雕塑的鑑賞力取決於對立體的反應能力。

sentences.english: Thus, we can see some installation works made by graduates from the sculpture department.
sentences.chinese: 所以在雕塑系畢業生的作品中也能看到部分裝置作品。

sentences.english: Therefore, statuary had turn into a three-dimensional political picture poster.
sentences.chinese: 由此，雕塑成爲了一種立體的政治“宣傳畫”。

sentences.english: A sculpture at the Detroit Zoo composed of Bullets and Gold Leaf.
sentences.chinese: 雕塑在底特律動物園組成的子彈和金葉。

sentences.english: People poured into the Beijing International Sculpture Park.
sentences.chinese: 人們湧進了北京國際雕塑公園。

sentences.english: King David's statue was made of bronze and it attracted many sculptors .
sentences.chinese: 大衛王的塑像是用青銅鑄造的，吸引了無數的雕塑家。

sentences.english: The sculptor figured the girl in clay.
sentences.chinese: 雕塑家用粘土塑造了這個女孩子的形象。

sentences.english: Massive segments or plates of the crust move over the mantle in the process of continental drift.
sentences.chinese: 大陸漂移雕塑了地殼的外觀，使現在大陸形成。

sentences.english: In the center of town is a pair of 20-foot-long sheet metal shidas.
sentences.chinese: 垨市中心有一雙20英尺長的金屬涼鞋雕塑。

sentences.english: As you use it, facial contours appear sculpted and newly defined.
sentences.chinese: 當你使用它，出現面部輪廓雕塑和新定義。

sentences.english: Byanalyzing the truth, I was prepared for defining soft sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 通過對事實的分析，爲如何界定軟雕塑做好準備。

sentences.english: The ancient Greek Parthenon is famed for its beautiful sculpture in bas-relief.
sentences.chinese: 古希臘的帕臺農神殿因其美麗的浮雕雕塑而聞名。

sentences.english: This statue commemorates those who died in the war.
sentences.chinese: 這個雕塑用於紀念那些戰爭中死去的人們。

sentences.english: Tianyijiao Food Street besides the sculpture on crossing of Wuma Street is very famous.
sentences.chinese: 五馬街口雕塑邊上的天一角食街小喫很有名氣。

sentences.english: Looking at the sculpture "Rose", I suddenly think of the old work, "Motherland".
sentences.chinese: 看着雕塑《玫瑰》，忽然有些懷念《故國》的舊作了。

sentences.english: The architecture in ancient Greek is really the unique sculptures.
sentences.chinese: 古希臘的建築的確是獨一無二的雕塑品。

definition: vivid and lifelike (idiom); true to life/realistic
